original: @32a * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @32a * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the glorious Vajravidāraṇa.🔽The practitioner who is endowed with the commitments, wishing to confer empowerment into the maṇḍala of the eight great planets, should construct the maṇḍala of the eight great planets in a place that is agreeable.

original: gza' chen po brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas gnas yid dang mthun par gza' chen po brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor bzhengs te sa'i cho ga la sogs pa sngon du song bas sa stegs gru bzhi ba la
analyzed: gza' chen po brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas gnas yid dang mthun par gza' chen po brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor bzhengs te sa'i cho ga la sogs pa sngon du song bas sa stegs gru bzhi ba la
translated: Having performed the earth ritual and so forth beforehand, the earth platform should be

original: shin tu mnyam par bya ste /
analyzed: shin tu mnyam par bya ste /
translated: very level.

original: thig btab la tshon rtsi sna tshogs pas dkyil 'khor le'u tse dgu pa la so so'i mdog dang mthun ba sgo bzhi dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: thig btab la tshon rtsi sna tshogs pas dkyil 'khor le'u tse dgu pa la so so'i mdog dang mthun ba sgo bzhi dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o //
translated: Having laid out the chalk lines, one should draw the maṇḍala with nine segments and four doors, each with a corresponding color.

original: de nas bum pa dgu la so so'i mtshan ma btab la gnas su gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas bum pa dgu la so so'i mtshan ma btab la gnas su gzhag par bya'o //
translated: Then, having placed the signs of each [planet] on the nine vases, they should be placed in their places.

original: grva rnams su phur bu dang rdo rje skud pas sbrel la mkhas pas gzugs so //
analyzed: grva rnams su phur bu dang rdo rje skud pas sbrel la mkhas pas gzugs so //
translated: In the corners, one should place daggers and connect them with vajra twine.

original: de ltar byas pa so so'i gnas su mtshan ma bris te /
analyzed: de ltar byas pa so so'i gnas su mtshan ma bris te /
translated: Having drawn the signs in their individual places,

original: ngos bzhir rdo rje dang rin po che dang / padma dang ; rgya gram bri'o //
analyzed: ngos bzhir rdo rje dang rin po che dang / padma dang ; rgya gram bri'o //
translated: In the four directions, draw a vajra, a jewel, a lotus, and a swastika.

original: dbus su rnam 'joms /🔽shar du ba ba sangs /
analyzed: dbus su rnam 'joms / shar du ba ba sangs /
translated: In the center, draw a Viṣṇu.🔽In the east, draw a moon.

original: nub tu zla ba'i mtshan ma /
analyzed: nub tu zla ba'i mtshan ma /
translated: In the west, draw a spike.

original: lhor phur bu /🔽byang du lhag pa /🔽shar lhor mig dmar /
analyzed: lhor phur bu / byang du lhag pa / shar lhor mig dmar /
translated: In the south, draw a thunderbolt.🔽In the north, draw a thunderbolt-topped club.🔽In the southeast, draw a Mars.

original: lho nub tu sgra gcan 'dzin /🔽nub byang du nyi ma /
analyzed: lho nub tu sgra gcan 'dzin / nub byang du nyi ma /
translated: In the southwest, draw Rāhu.🔽In the northwest, draw the sun.

original: byang shar du sben pa'i mtshan ma bri'o //
analyzed: byang shar du sben pa'i mtshan ma bri'o //
translated: In the northeast, draw Saturn.

original: sgo rnams su lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril bu bri'o //
analyzed: sgo rnams su lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril bu bri'o //
translated: At the gates, draw a hook, a noose, a chain, and a bell.

original: de nas so so'i sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyan drangs te /
analyzed: de nas so so'i sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyan drangs te /
translated: Then, invite them with their individual mantras and mudras.

original: lag pa gnyis 'khor lo ltar byas la /
analyzed: lag pa gnyis 'khor lo ltar byas la /
translated: Make the two hands into a wheel,

original: aom na ma: tsanda badzra b'a na ye h'um zhes brjod pas /
analyzed: aom na ma: tsanda badzra b'a na ye h'um zhes brjod pas /
translated: and say, “Oṃ namo vajra-vāṇīye hūṃ.”

original: dbus su rnam 'joms sku mdog dkar po g-yas 'khor lo g-yon bum pa 'dzin pa /
analyzed: dbus su rnam 'joms sku mdog dkar po g-yas 'khor lo g-yon bum pa 'dzin pa /
translated: In the center, generate Viṣṇu, white in color, holding a wheel in the right hand and a vase in the left hand,

original: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bskyed do //
analyzed: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bskyed do //
translated: adorned with all ornaments.

original: lag pa g-yas pa bkan la padma'i tshul du bstan la /
analyzed: lag pa g-yas pa bkan la padma'i tshul du bstan la /
translated: Extend the right hand, displaying it like a lotus,🔽and say, “Oṃ namo vajra-pāṇaye hūṃ.”

original: na mo ra ti bi ya sarba sva ta lha ta ka ra hi hi ka sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas /
analyzed: na mo ra ti bi ya sarba sva ta lha ta ka ra hi hi ka sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas /
translated: By reciting nama ratna-viyasa sarva-sattva-latha-karahi hihikara svāhā,

original: shar gyi bum pa la pa bsangs mdog dmar po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bskyed do //
analyzed: shar gyi bum pa la pa bsangs mdog dmar po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bskyed do //
translated: one generates the eastern vase, red in color and adorned with all ornaments.

original: lag pa g-yon pa khu tshur bcangs la mthe bong dang mdzub mo sbyar te zla gam gyi tshul du bstan la /
analyzed: lag pa g-yon pa khu tshur bcangs la mthe bong dang mdzub mo sbyar te zla gam gyi tshul du bstan la /
translated: With the left hand in the form of a fist, the thumb and index finger joined, one displays the shape of a half-moon.

original: na ma: tsandr'a ya shi ta ha pra bha ba ma li ni sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas /
analyzed: na ma: tsandr'a ya shi ta ha pra bha ba ma li ni sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas /
translated: By reciting nama candrāya śita-ha-prabhava-malini svāhā,

original: nub tu zla ba mdog dkar po dang pa la zhon pa lag pa na padma thogs ba drung na bud med rda yab thogs pa bskyed do //
analyzed: nub tu zla ba mdog dkar po dang pa la zhon pa lag pa na padma thogs ba drung na bud med rda yab thogs pa bskyed do //
translated: one generates the moon in the west, white in color, riding on a deer, holding a lotus in the hand, and a woman holding a fly whisk in front.

original: lag pa g-yon ba'i khu tshur bcangs la /
analyzed: lag pa g-yon ba'i khu tshur bcangs la /
translated: With the left hand in the form of a fist,

original: lag pa g-yas pa dam pa sbyin @32b pa'i tshul du byas la /
analyzed: lag pa g-yas pa dam pa sbyin @32b pa'i tshul du byas la /
translated: with the right hand in the gesture of granting fearlessness,

original: na mo de ba gu ru bha ki sha ya sa ra sa tye na ha ga ri ri sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas /
analyzed: na mo de ba gu ru bha ki sha ya sa ra sa tye na ha ga ri ri sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas /
translated: by reciting nama devaguru bakishaya sarasatyena hagarirī svāhā,🔽one generates the sun in the south, red in color, riding on a peacock, holding a lotus in the hand, and a man holding a fly whisk in front.

original: lhor phur bu sku mdog dkar po zla ba'i steng na 'dug pa dar ser po'i stod g-yogs gyon pa /
analyzed: lhor phur bu sku mdog dkar po zla ba'i steng na 'dug pa dar ser po'i stod g-yogs gyon pa /
translated: In the south, generate Mercury, white in color, sitting on a moon, wearing an upper garment of yellow silk,

original: lag pa g-yon pa na glegs bam thogs pa /
analyzed: lag pa g-yon pa na glegs bam thogs pa /
translated: holding a scripture in the left hand,

original: g-yas chos ston pa 'dra ba bskyed do //
analyzed: g-yas chos ston pa 'dra ba bskyed do //
translated: and with the right hand as if teaching the dharma.🔽Place the two fists on the chest

original: lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa brang du bzhag la /
analyzed: lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa brang du bzhag la /
translated: and recite:

original: na mo yu b'a r'a dz'a ya sarba satva pa tsa la ya sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas /
analyzed: na mo yu b'a r'a dz'a ya sarba satva pa tsa la ya sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas /
translated: Namo yuvā rājāya sarva satva pacalāya svāhā.

original: byang du gza' lag pa mdog ser po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /🔽g-yon autpa la /
analyzed: byang du gza' lag pa mdog ser po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa / g-yon autpa la /
translated: In the north, generate Mars, yellow in color, adorned with all ornaments,🔽holding an utpala in the left hand

original: g-yas dam pa sbyin pa /
analyzed: g-yas dam pa sbyin pa /
translated: and granting boons with the right hand.

original: padma'i gdan la 'dug par bskyed do //
analyzed: padma'i gdan la 'dug par bskyed do //
translated: Generate him sitting on a lotus seat.

original: g-yas pa khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo dang gung mo mtshan ma'i tshul du byas la /🔽na mo bhu su ta rakta ma bya sri ya ga rta aa pa ra na ya sv'a h'a /
analyzed: g-yas pa khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo dang gung mo mtshan ma'i tshul du byas la / na mo bhu su ta rakta ma bya sri ya ga rta aa pa ra na ya sv'a h'a /
translated: Make a fist with the right hand, with the index and middle fingers in the form of a sign,

original: zhes brjod pas /
analyzed: zhes brjod pas /
translated: and recite:🔽Namo bhusu ta rakta mā vya sriya gartā aparāṇāya svāhā.

original: shar lhor mig dmar mdog dkar po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: shar lhor mig dmar mdog dkar po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
translated: In the southeast, generate Ketu, white in color, adorned with all ornaments,

original: g-yas ral gri g-yon chad gri thogs pa bskyed do //
analyzed: g-yas ral gri g-yon chad gri thogs pa bskyed do //
translated: He is generated holding a sword in his right hand and a knife in his left hand.

original: lag pa g-yon bkan la snod kyi tshul du bstan la /
analyzed: lag pa g-yon bkan la snod kyi tshul du bstan la /
translated: With the left hand turned over and shown in the manner of a vessel,

original: na mo bhi sha ma ge'u smra shi dza li ta aa tsa sha sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas /
analyzed: na mo bhi sha ma ge'u smra shi dza li ta aa tsa sha sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas /
translated: one should say, “Oṃ namo bhisaguruśrījītalitācaśa svāhā.”

original: lho nub tu sgra gcan mdog dud ka mi'i mgo la ro smad sbrul du 'khyil pa lus mig gis khengs pa /
analyzed: lho nub tu sgra gcan mdog dud ka mi'i mgo la ro smad sbrul du 'khyil pa lus mig gis khengs pa /
translated: In the southwest, Rāhu is generated, the color of smoke, with a human head and the lower part of his body coiled as a snake, his body filled with eyes,

original: g-yas mda' gzhu g-yon rin po che'i snod 'dzin pa bskyed do //
analyzed: g-yas mda' gzhu g-yon rin po che'i snod 'dzin pa bskyed do //
translated: holding a bow and arrow in his right hand and a precious vessel in his left hand.

original: lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la /
analyzed: lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la /
translated: With both hands made into fists,

original: mthe bong gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis brkyang ste /
analyzed: mthe bong gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis brkyang ste /
translated: the two thumbs and two pinkies extended,

original: nam mkha'i tshul du bya ste /
analyzed: nam mkha'i tshul du bya ste /
translated: one should make the gesture of space

original: aom ma ka sho pa ya sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas /
analyzed: aom ma ka sho pa ya sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas /
translated: and say, “Oṃ ma ka śo pāya svāhā.”

original: nub byang du nyi ma mdog dmar po rtal zhon pa lag pa gnyis padma thogs pa bskyed do //
analyzed: nub byang du nyi ma mdog dmar po rtal zhon pa lag pa gnyis padma thogs pa bskyed do //
translated: In the northwest, the sun is generated, red in color, mounted on a horse, holding lotuses in both hands.

original: g-yas thal mo'i tshul du byas la na mo bha ting ga ma ma h'a y'a na ka sa sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas /
analyzed: g-yas thal mo'i tshul du byas la na mo bha ting ga ma ma h'a y'a na ka sa sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas /
translated: With the right hand in the manner of a palm, one should say, “Oṃ namo bhatinggama mahāyānakasa svāhā.”

original: byang shar du sben pa mdog nag po gos dmar po gyon pa g-yas ral gri g-yon zhags pa thogs pa bskyed do //
analyzed: byang shar du sben pa mdog nag po gos dmar po gyon pa g-yas ral gri g-yon zhags pa thogs pa bskyed do //
translated: In the northeast, generate black-colored Vena wearing red garments, holding a sword in the right hand and a noose in the left hand.

original: sgo rnams su gzhan dang mthun pa'i sgom bskyed do //
analyzed: sgo rnams su gzhan dang mthun pa'i sgom bskyed do //
translated: Generate the other gatekeepers in the gates as usual.

original: khyams rnams su rgyu skar rnams bskyed /
analyzed: khyams rnams su rgyu skar rnams bskyed /
translated: Generate the lunar mansions in the courtyards.

original: de dag la dza: h'um bam ho: ye shes sems dpa' dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang gnyis su med par bstim par byas la /
analyzed: de dag la dza: h'um bam ho: ye shes sems dpa' dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang gnyis su med par bstim par byas la /
translated: Summon, induct, bind, and dissolve into nonduality the nine awareness beings with jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ.

original: ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la dmigs te bsnyen pa bskyar ba ni /🔽aom shu sv'a h'a /
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la dmigs te bsnyen pa bskyar ba ni / aom shu sv'a h'a /
translated: Visualize the moon maṇḍala of the awareness beings’ maṇḍala and repeat the recitation.🔽oṃ śu svaḥ

original: aom so sv'a h'a /🔽aom bri sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom so sv'a h'a / aom bri sv'a h'a /
translated: oṃ so svaḥ🔽oṃ bri svaḥ

original: aom bu sv'a h'a /🔽aom aam sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom bu sv'a h'a / aom aam sv'a h'a /
translated: oṃ bu svaḥ🔽oṃ aṃ svaḥ

original: aom ra sv'a h'a /🔽aom aa sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom ra sv'a h'a / aom aa sv'a h'a /
translated: oṃ ra svaḥ🔽oṃ a svaḥ

original: aom sa sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom sa sv'a h'a /
translated: oṃ sa svaḥ

original: @33a * // de dag re re la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la /
analyzed: @33a * // de dag re re la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la /
translated: Recite each one one hundred and eight times.

original: de nas mchod pa dang bstod pa bya ste /
analyzed: de nas mchod pa dang bstod pa bya ste /
translated: Then perform the offerings and praises.

original: gza' brgyad rgyu skar dang bcas pa'i gtor ma la yang bstod do //
analyzed: gza' brgyad rgyu skar dang bcas pa'i gtor ma la yang bstod do //
translated: Also praise the bali for the eight planets and the lunar mansions.

original: de nas mchog gi bzlas pa brtsam par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas mchog gi bzlas pa brtsam par bya'o //
translated: Then begin the supreme recitation.

original: so so'i bzlas pa bum pa la dmigs te /
analyzed: so so'i bzlas pa bum pa la dmigs te /
translated: The individual recitations focus on the vase.

original: aom ma h'a k'a le be ga ra na aa dzi te /
analyzed: aom ma h'a k'a le be ga ra na aa dzi te /
translated: Oṃ mahākālī vegarājājitā

original: dzva la dzva la /
analyzed: dzva la dzva la /
translated: jvālā jvālā🔽ti ti ti ti tiṅgalā

original: ti ti ti ti ting ga le da ha da ha te dzo ba ti /
analyzed: ti ti ti ti ting ga le da ha da ha te dzo ba ti /
translated: daha daha tejovatī🔽ti lī ti lī hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: ti li ti li h'um phat sv'a h'a zhes pa re re la stong phrag re re bzlas so //
analyzed: ti li ti li h'um phat sv'a h'a zhes pa re re la stong phrag re re bzlas so //
translated: Recite each one one thousand times.

original: gtso bo ni so so'i las dang sbyor /
analyzed: gtso bo ni so so'i las dang sbyor /
translated: The principal one is applied to each action.

original: las su byed na gong ma'i so so'i snying po la khri phrag re bskyal la yang sbyar ro //
analyzed: las su byed na gong ma'i so so'i snying po la khri phrag re bskyal la yang sbyar ro //
translated: If performing an action, apply the above individual essence mantras and recite each ten thousand times.

original: dbang bskur na tha ma rnams kyis bya'o ;
analyzed: dbang bskur na tha ma rnams kyis bya'o ;
translated: If conferring empowerment, the latter ones should be done.

original: / brgya brgya'i bar du gza' rnams la p'u dza bya'o //
analyzed: / brgya brgya'i bar du gza' rnams la p'u dza bya'o //
translated: Offer pūjā to the planets one hundred times each.

original: dkar gsum mngar gsum gyis gza' rnams mnyes par bya'o //
analyzed: dkar gsum mngar gsum gyis gza' rnams mnyes par bya'o //
translated: Please the planets with the three white foods and the three sweet foods.

original: de nas slob ma rnams khrus byas te /
analyzed: de nas slob ma rnams khrus byas te /
translated: Then the disciples wash.

original: gos gsar pa gyon la bskyed pa la sogs pa sngon du byas /
analyzed: gos gsar pa gyon la bskyed pa la sogs pa sngon du byas /
translated: Dressed in new clothes, they perform the preliminaries such as the creation of the deity.

original: dkyil 'khor du bcug ste me tog dor ba la sogs pa dang / dbang bskur bar bya'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor du bcug ste me tog dor ba la sogs pa dang / dbang bskur bar bya'o //
translated: Having entered into the maṇḍala, one should cast the flower, and so forth, and confer the empowerment.

original: de nas khrus byas la gza' chen po brgyad kyi ba lim gtang ngo //
analyzed: de nas khrus byas la gza' chen po brgyad kyi ba lim gtang ngo //
translated: Then, having bathed, one should offer the bali of the eight great planets.

original: de'i 'og tu phyogs skyong dang bgegs kyi gtor ma sgra sna tshogs pa dang ldan pas btang la /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu phyogs skyong dang bgegs kyi gtor ma sgra sna tshogs pa dang ldan pas btang la /
translated: After that, having offered the oblation of the direction protectors and obstructors with various sounds,

original: dkyil 'khor bsdu ba dang bkra shis gsol ba la sogs pa bya'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor bsdu ba dang bkra shis gsol ba la sogs pa bya'o //
translated: one should gather the maṇḍala, offer the benediction, and so forth.

original: gza' chen po brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i cho ga nyi ma bcud len bya ba dpal mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: gza' chen po brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i cho ga nyi ma bcud len bya ba dpal mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The ritual of conferring empowerment into the maṇḍala of the eight great planets, called Extracting the Essence of the Sun, composed by Śrī Dīpaṃkara, is complete.
